attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This thing is bad and dumb and needs to get taken off the App Store and I thought that google Classroom was bad🙄🙄 but no this is worse WAY worse

attributes.title: Revenge
attributes.review: Sorry your baby feelings were hurt but you come after tiktok we come after you

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS!!! No cheetos!!!!l
attributes.review: This app is so misleading! I honestly thought that if I downloaded, I would get a free bag of cheetos, but after I registered, there was no offer for a free bag of cheetos. 0/10 do not recommend.

attributes.title: Remove app
attributes.review: This app took weeks to download and as soon as it did it wiped my phone and cleared my Apple ID and iCloud. This app is not good at all and needs to be removed.

attributes.title: Why?
attributes.review: Why is it that I supportED trump but then he claims so many false lies please show us evidence before you go on posting fake news on your app. Democrat 😌✋

attributes.title: Angry
attributes.review: App slowed down my phone it won’t stop crashing I’m very disappointed with how the app has absolutely destroyed my phone

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I had to walk outside and do a spell just to get it working, not to mention how confusing to navigate it is *sticks up my nose and crosses my arms in a Karen fashion*

attributes.title: Terrible absolutely terrible🧚🏽✨
attributes.review: It DRAINED my battery and then made my iPhone lag and not work efficiently. Then it prevented me from doing anything PRODUCTIVE on my phone. 0/100 WOULD NOR RECOMMEND!!!! 😤😡

attributes.title: HUGELY TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This thing seemed to automatically get all my information off my device and deleted every non white male contact I had.

attributes.title: This was a terrible app..
attributes.review: I thought trump was going to “ make America great again” he has proven he doesn’t deserve to be president.. and is taking away freedom of speech...
